# Examples

Working examples in the [`examples/`](https://github.com/AgentlyHQ/aixyz/tree/main/examples) directory.

## Auto-Generated Server

| Example              | Description           |
| -------------------- | --------------------- |
| `agent-boilerplate`  | Minimal weather agent |
| `agent-price-oracle` | CoinGecko price feeds |

These use `app/agent.ts` + `app/tools/` only. No `server.ts`.

## Custom Server

| Example                    | Description                     |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `agent-chainlink`          | Chainlink data feeds            |
| `agent-job-hunter`         | Remote job search via Jobicy    |
| `agent-travel`             | Flight search + Stripe payments |
| `agent-with-custom-server` | Minimal custom server reference |

These use `app/server.ts` to manually wire A2A, MCP, and x402.

### Custom Server Pattern

```ts
import { AixyzServer } from "aixyz/server";
import { useA2A } from "aixyz/server/adapters/a2a";
import { AixyzMCP } from "aixyz/server/adapters/mcp";

import * as agent from "./agent";
import lookup from "./tools/lookup";

const server = new AixyzServer();
await server.initialize();

useA2A(server, agent);

const mcp = new AixyzMCP(server);
await mcp.register("lookup", {
  default: lookup,
  accepts: { scheme: "exact", price: "$0.001" },
});
await mcp.connect();

export default server;
```
